hello and welcome to an episode of women

of zero carbon electricity welcome
Hannah hi I'm Hannah Lal and I'm senior
Tech leader of short-term trading in
wholesale Market services at EDF so
Hannah um I'd like to start with getting
to know a little bit more about your

range of things really anything from um
something's gone wrong in the on the

is we're trading electricity and gas on

Services uh just to make sure that we

throughout the wholesale Market Services
Tech area excellent so a lot of points

guess I've always had a kind of tech

there's not many women in in that area

what's the reason for it whereas I was

Cher for our technology capability in

the ecosystem look like um at EDF today

engagement like say being business

um is that a big part to most functions

understand what it is that they want run

working with these different areas and
so our software Engineers would have

excellent so they get to work with the

yeah I think um I think looking back I
think I picked the right the right area
to work in energy is just so interesting
it's something that um you know we don't

go and you just switch the light on and

to be honest I'm really happy where I am
